changes in strategy generally," a Google spokesperson wrote in an e-mail to the Globe. Local academics and consultants who are familiar with Google's operations in the Boston area tend to agree. I would categorize the changes at Google as more of a "growing up' than a` shake-up,' said Harvard Business School professor Rosabeth Moss Kanter . " Eric Schmidt has been the adult supervision at Google for 10 years, and now it's time for the founders to take over. That"s what this is.
